mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime, u.user_name AS 'user.userName', u.user_email AS 'user.userEmail' FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND r.enabled = #{enabled}
